resources.string: We are going to start with a survey and according to your answers to our questions, we are going to recommend activities and events we think you may like. On the next screen you choose categories that interest you and we will offer you a set of questions regarding those categories. You will have the option to delete activities and events you do not like or want to do and to add those you are interested in. \n\nLetâ€™s get started!
